pullRequest.title: support build individual module
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please answer these questions before submitting a pull request


Why submit this pull request?


 Bug fix


Related issues
resolved #5488



Bug fix

Bug description.
How to fix?
In submodule build, using the absolute path to find the check-style file


New feature or improvement

Describe the details and related test reports.

commit.message: enforce maven version must greater than 3.6

nodes.bodyText:
This makes you need to update the compiling doc
https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/guides/How-to-build.md#build-from-github
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -383,12 +383,16 @@
                         <goals>
                             <goal>enforce</goal>
                         </goals>
+                        <phase>validate</phase>
                         <configuration>
                             <rules>
                                 <requireJavaVersion>
                                     <!-- Build has not yet been updated for Java 9+ -->
                                     <version>1.8</version>
                                 </requireJavaVersion>
+                                <requireMavenVersion>
+                                    <version>3.6</version>

nodes.bodyText:
At least 3 places should be updated.

Prepare git, JDK8, and Maven 3.6+
Add document about compiling a single plugin in the Advanced compile part.
Remove Setup your Eclipse IDE section, it is out of the update.

commit.message: update build doc to support maven3.6+
